name: tandf-pyramid-oa-dashboard-v1
description: The Pyramid is a T&F project with the goal of creating a single platform that allows customers and consumer to access, read and manage content seamlessly from one T&F interface.
author: T&F Technology

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:ui
scripts.build:local: npm run build:server && npm run build:uilocal
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:server && npm run build:ui
scripts.build:uat: npm run build:server && npm run build:uiuat
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:server && npm run build:uiprod
scripts.clean: npm run clean:server && npm run clean:ui
scripts.install: npm run install:server && npm run install:ui && npm run install:typings
scripts.docker:remove: npm run docker:rm && npm run docker:rmi
scripts.docker:rm: npm run docker:kill && docker rm tandf-pyr-cust-web-1 && docker ps
scripts.docker:run: docker run --name tandf-pyr-cust-web-1 -P -d tandf-pyr-cust-web:latest && docker ps
scripts.docker:start: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run
scripts.docker:update: npm run docker:remove && npm run docker:start
scripts.test: npm run test:ui && npm run test:server
